name: BROMFENAC

indications.text: bromfenac ophthalmic solution 0.09 % indicated treatment postoperative inflammation reduction ocular pain patients undergone cataract surgery .

contraindications.text: instill one drop affected eye ( ) daily beginning 1 day prior surgery , continued day surgery first 14 days post-surgery .

warningsAndPrecautions: bromfenac ophthalmic solution 0.09 % supplied 5 ml screw neck bottle ( white ldpe ) nozzle ( white ldpe ) screw cap ( grey color- hdpe ) follows : 1.7 ml 5 ml container ( ndc 72266-142-01 ) storage store 15º 25ºc ( 59º 77ºf ) .
indications_original: Bromfenac ophthalmic solution 0.09% is indicated for the treatment of postoperative inflammation and reduction of ocular pain in patients who have undergone cataract surgery.
contraindications_original: Instill one drop into the affected eye(s) once daily beginning 1 day prior to surgery, continued on the day of surgery and through the first 14 days post-surgery.
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Bromfenac ophthalmic solution 0.09% is supplied in a 5 ml Screw neck bottle (White LDPE) with a Nozzle (White LDPE) Screw cap (Grey color- HDPE) as follows:
  
                     
                     
                     
1.7 mL in 5 mL container (NDC 72266-142-01)
  
                     
                     
                     
                     STORAGE
                     
                     
                     
                     
Store at 15º to 25ºC (59º to 77ºF).
